t: Amazon Big Spring Sale: The Best Ninja Deals Worth Shopping
s: March 25, 2025 - This durable cookware set from Ninja comes with 14 pieces, including three frying pans, two saucepans, a saute pan, a stock pot, and accompanying lids, according to the brand. The cookware is scratch and stain-resistant, and can withstand heat up to 550 degrees Fahrenheit.

t: This top-rated Ninja Air Fryer is back to its lowest price at Amazon | TechRadar
s: October 30, 2024 - This Ninja Air Fryer is ideal for prepping for Thanksgiving. But, even without a holiday dinner on your mind, you can meal prep for an entire family at the press of a button. You can now get the Ninja Foodi DZ550 Air Fryer at Amazon for $129.99 (was $249.99).

t: The 6 Best Ninja Blenders of 2025: Reviews - RTINGS.com
s: February 12, 2025 - The best Ninja blender we've tested is the Ninja Foodi Cold & Hot Blender. Unlike many Ninja blenders, it's a full-size blender with only one jar, so it's best suited for people looking for a conventional blender rather than one with extra jars and accessories.
